posts.title: Burrito Pencil Pouch
posts.content: Keep your daily essentials organized and at hand by storing them inside this burrito pencil pouch. It sports a tasty looking tortilla exterior, comes with internal mesh pockets for storage, and features a functional wrap design that prevents anything from falling out.

posts.title: Dancing With Cats Book
posts.content: Originally released in 1999, the cult classic “Dancing With Cats” is back for a whole new generation of cat-lovers to gush over. Each page depicts a hilarious photo of a cat and their human sharing some quality time as they perform a variety of elegant poses.

posts.title: Mini iOS Microphone
posts.content: Podcast anywhere, anytime and keep your enormous fanbase of three listeners satisfied by using the mini iOS microphone. Designed for both smartphones and tablets, this compact mic delivers outstanding sound quality for your lucrative podcasting career.

posts.title: Liquor Bottle Lock
posts.content: Keep your precious hooch safe from all your conniving roommates using this liquor bottle lock. This key-operated lock features a sturdy tamper-proof construction and is designed to contour to a variety of bottle necks for a tight and secure fit.

posts.title: Waterproof iPhone Case
posts.content: Get serious about your underwater photography as you dive in for a session using the waterproof iPhone case. The minimalist design gives your phone an elegant appearance while providing easy access to all of the phone’s soon to be obsolete features.

posts.title: Zoom ARQ Aero RhythmTrak?
posts.content: When it comes to high-tech musical gadgets, you won’t find a better toy than the Zoom ARQ RythmTrak. It combines a drum machine, looper, clip launcher, sequencer, synthesizer, and a MIDI control so you can create music anytime, anywhere.

posts.title: Sliced Bread Chair
posts.content: Stay comfy while you lounge around on the floor by sandwiching yourself inside this sliced bread chair. Styled like an extra long slice of white bread, the chair folds at its midpoint and can hold a reclining position at several different angles.

posts.title: Wasabi Kit Kat Bar
posts.content: Send your taste buds on an exotic journey when you take a bite out of the wasabi Kit Kat bar. Featuring the classic wasabi flavor without the painful kick to the mouth, this lime green chocolate bar is simply delightful and has no spiciness to it whatsoever.

posts.title: Easy To Use Meat & Poultry Injector
posts.content: Leave your dinner guests begging for seconds by utilizing this easy to use meat and poultry injector. It features a large handle so that you can pull and push from any angle and boasts a wide stainless steel needle that is ideal for thick sauces and marinates.

posts.title: Darth Vader And Son Book
posts.content: Wonder no more what life would have been like for Luke if his neglectful old man had been around more often with the Darth Vader and Son book. This adorably illustrated book features 64 pages of Star Wars themed hijinks, and makes a great gift for Father’s Day.

posts.title: The 4-Hour Work Week
posts.content: Begin living the leisurely life you’ve always envisioned with help from The 4-Hour Work Week. You’ll learn everything from outsourcing your work to overseas virtual assistants, to trading a long-haul career for short work bursts.

posts.title: Doggy Goggles
posts.content: With the doggy goggles your canine friend will be able to enjoy a warm sunny day without exposing their eyes to harmful UV rays. The specially designed goggles feature an ultra wide nose bridge and a deep lens that protects the eyes from all external threats.
